about: Join Rare Affairs for Orbit Spin – A Rare Hitech Affair on January 31, 2025, at Pebble - The Jungle Lounge in Bangalore. This event promises to redefine your party experience and immerse you in the vibrant psytrance culture of Bangalore.

about: Join us for Core Festival at High Ultra Lounge on February 8th, starting at 7 PM, as Bengaluru transforms into a techno paradise. Experience electrifying beats from over five sensational artists while enjoying breathtaking views from the city's highest party spot. Limited passes are available, so secure your ticket now and get ready for an unforgettable night of music and energy.

Discover new music that could become a staple on your playlist and connect with fellow fans in this unique experience.
